cards.name: The Erased
cards.originalText: Cards in graveyards, exile, and libraries lose all abilities and card types.

rulings.text: The Erased will interfere with any effect that cares about card types in these zones, for example Tarmogoyf will find zero card types, and Enlightened Tutor can't find an enchantment card.
The Erased will prevent any abilities that function in these zones, such as Destiny, Engorge, Erratic, Inscribe, Purge, Prophecy, and Reprise.
